WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
FLORIDA.
DNC 15.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM
33 FOOT S/V SERENDIPITY, WHITE HULL, IN VICINITY
28-57.50N 079-38.40W. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC MIAMI,
PHONE: 305 415 6800, E-MAIL: RCCMIAMI@USCG.MIL.
